p.k: Documentary, Adventure, Biography, Family Spain, Morocco (2015). Hrají: Juan Manuel Aznarez Chacon, Juan Manuel Aznarez Rosado, Sergio Aznarez Rosado. Režie: Juan Rayos.
p.d: True smile is the story about a trip through the empty glance of an autist and blind boy who crosses 1.300 kms in tandem bycicle with his brother. This documentary inmerses us into the Sergio's unreachable world, that seems to the desert, the destination of their trip.
